description: Cook a pub-worthy beef pepper steak complete with sweet caramelised onion and a crisp Greek salad with tender potatoes in just 20 minutes.
keywords: Speedy Pepper Steak With Caramelised Onion & Greek Potato Salad
name: Speedy Pepper Steak With Caramelised Onion & Greek Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g Woolworths COOK baby potatoes with butter & herb
600 g Woolworths COOK peppered beef steaks

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare salad according to packet instructions. Thickly slice potatoes and toss through salad. Place steaks on plates and top with caramelised onion. Divide salad among plates and serve with relish.
